pages.title: Manasmith
pages.text: This villager has dedicated his life to the research of the occult. He definitely $(l)CAN$() craft advanced stuff, but why $(l)SHOULD$() he sell it to you? Unless you are a Manasmith yourself, then he's definitely gonna. Research is not cheap. It's also the only guy around who know how to create Soul Vessels, so try to not make him hate you.

pages.name: Manasmith
pages.text: An unemployed villager can become a Manasmith when standing near a Runic Artifact.
